channel.title: Skills giving no xp, but they did [317] Delta
channel.description:
Hello, currently 2 skills are giving no xp in which I know they originally did. I'm not sure when this happend or how, but randomly I noticed "Mage" gave no experience, and I have no idea how to fix it, currently my players cannot raise their magic levels, and slayer tasks no longer give xp. I have spent a long time in the client.java scimming over everything, but I just don't know what to look for and this is a very large issue for me right now, maybe sombody could help?
EDIT: I'm stupid, xp lock..............
